summary: This document is an email chain from March 5-6, 2024, discussing an ongoing Senate Finance Committee investigation into Leon Black's tax planning and financial ties with Jeffrey Epstein, and referencing a Dechert internal investigation report filed with the SEC.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Private equity billionaire whose tax planning and financial ties with Jeffrey Epstein are under investigation by the Senate Finance Committee.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of financial ties with Leon Black that are part of the Senate Finance Committee investigation.

persons.name: Wyden
persons.context: Senator Ron Wyden is leading the ongoing investigation into Leon Black's tax planning and financial ties with Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: The Senate Finance Committee is investigating the financial ties between Leon Black and Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email sharing investigation links
events.description: An email was sent containing links to the Senate Finance Committee investigation into Leon Black and the Dechert internal investigation report.

events.title: Email chain discussion
events.description: A series of emails on March 6, 2024, discussing the previously shared investigation materials and arranging to talk.

keyFacts: The Senate Finance Committee, chaired by Senator Ron Wyden, has an ongoing investigation into private equity billionaire Leon Black's tax planning and financial ties with Jeffrey Epstein.
A Dechert internal investigation report related to this matter has been filed with the SEC and is publicly accessible.
The email chain from March 5-6, 2024, shows individuals discussing and planning to talk about these investigation materials.
